MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in The Beeches and surrounding areas. Engineers have located the fault on our underground cable network and we still expect all power to be restored by 6AM. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.22AM on 14th December 2020.
